ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of December, 1986, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The order of the Superior Court is hereby reversed, and the case is remanded to the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County for further proceedings in consideration of our decision in Amardio v. Levin, 509 Pa. 199, 501 A.2d 1085 (1985).
McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ., join only in the grant of allocatur and dissent from the PER CURIAM order.
